price: ហើយពួកយើងក៏គ្មានអំណាចគៀបសង្កត់ពួកអ្នក(មិន ឱ្យជឿលើអល់ឡោះ)ដែរ។ ផ្ទុយទៅវិញ ពួកអ្នកទេជាក្រុមដែល វងេ្វងនោះ។
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيۡكُم مِّن سُلۡطَٰنِۭۖ بَلۡ كُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا طَٰغِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna lanā ʿalaykum min sul'ṭānin bal kuntum qawman ṭāghīna
